basics.name: Bojan Krstic
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: I am from Pirot. I am finished Faculty of Electronic Engineering, University of Nis Major-Computer Science and Informatics. I work for Tigar A.D. from Pirot as a senior software developer.

highlights: Involved in all aspects of the software life cycle from analysis, design, develop and testing of software prior to installation
Create new and redesign existing table into the system, according to the specification, create entity-relationship model.
Design, code and write specifications according to customer(users) requirement
Changes and improvements to existing applications based on user requrements
Writing technical and function specification documents Application Developer and Architect, Database Administrator and Designer, in a wide variety of business applications
Excellent knowledge of relational database systems and their design.
Manage several database located on IBM server, create schema and  scripts for data manipulation, minimize operating cost and improve  functionality
